lead_paragraph: Jared Rosenthal’s trucks, which are recreational vehicles converted into rolling laboratories offering on-the-spot DNA testing, might seem like unlikely confessionals.

headline.print_headline: 2 Rolling DNA Labs Address the Ultimate Question: ‘Who’s Your Daddy?’
headline.main: Rolling DNA Labs Address the Ultimate Question: ‘Who’s Your Daddy?’

snippet: Jared Rosenthal’s trucks, which are recreational vehicles converted into rolling laboratories offering on-the-spot DNA testing, might seem like unlikely confessionals....
abstract: Onetime health care marketer Jared Rosenthal has struck out on his own with pair of trucks offering on-the-spot DNA testing in New York City under name Who's Your Daddy?; Rosenthal says service draws out family secrets and offers unique vantage point for looking into questions of identity.
